bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom butted Aluminum with PowerCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL custom butted Aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Rock Shox Tora 302 U-Turn w/PopLoc Remote & 80-130mm Travel
Formula DC-2X Sealed Alloy 36H Hubs with Alex DM-18 Alloy Double Wall Rims
Kenda, K-841A, Police Knite Glo reflective sidewall, 26 x 1.95"
Tektro Aquila Mechanical Disc w/ 160mm rotor
Ritchey Logic Zero Comp 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji Alloy Handlebar, Black, 560mm with bar ends
Fuji extruded Alloy, adjustable angle and removable faceplate
Fuji Suspension with adjustable spring, Micro Adjust, 300mm
